name: Guardian Safe
description: A secure wrapper for Safe wallet functionality using GuardianAccountAbstraction security framework for enhanced transaction security and controls.
features: Time-locked transaction security with configurable delay
Meta-transaction support for gasless approvals and cancellations
Transaction guard integration with Safe contracts
Delegated call controls for enhanced security

MultiPhaseSecureOperation.name: MultiPhaseSecureOperation
MultiPhaseSecureOperation.description: Library for implementing secure multi-phase operations with time-locks and meta-transactions

GuardianAccountAbstraction.name: GuardianAccountAbstraction
GuardianAccountAbstraction.description: Framework for implementing secure account abstraction with role-based permissions and time-locked operations
